arm_group.arm_group_label: Screening for cancers in the oral cavity

brief_summary.textblock:
In the Somme region of France, cancer registry data showed an increasing incidence of oral
      cancer. The Incidence Rates in Somme as compared to the national rates for Lip, Oral Cavity
      and Pharynx Cancer were in 2010:  31,4/100  000 Standard population versus 18,2 /100 000 for
      male and 8,2/100 000 versus 5,5/100 000 for female, disaster area where action to improve
      early detection for smokers will be assessed. This target population consults late (as 70%
      of oral cavity cancers are diagnosed at a late stage (T3 or T4). This project is an
      innovative incentive strategy for screening among general practitioners based on unusual
      information vectors (tobacconist, local media).

      The main objective of this study is a screening of oral cavity cancers in tobacco users aged
      30-75 years in the Somme region of France.

clinical_study.brief_title: Screening for Cancers in the Oral CAvity

detailed_description.textblock:
Methodology:

        -  Education and alerting physicians to the early detection of cancers of oral cavity and
           coordination of networks involved for 1 year.

        -  Incentive period for the screening by the tobacconist who distributes with every
           package of cigarettes bought a flyer of invitation to the screening.

        -  Carrying out screening examinations by general practitioners with completion of the
           customized examination forms, orientation towards a specialist, data collection and
           evaluation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Any smoker who buys a pack of cigarettes over a period of two weeks in a tobacco shop
             located on the territory of the Somme

          -  lives in somme departement

        Exclusion Criteria:

        -

intervention.arm_group_label: Screening for cancers in the oral cavity
intervention.intervention_name: Invitation for oral cavity cancer screening

clinical_study.official_title: Screening for Cancers in the Oral CAvity Targeting Tobacco Users in Somme, France

oversight_info.authority: France: Afssaps - Agence française de sécurité sanitaire des produits de santé (Saint-Denis)

primary_outcome.description: Numbers of people who benefit from a screening exam by a physician of the Somme region in comparison, with the target population of the Somme region. This rate will be also calculated according the different of age and sex.
primary_outcome.measure: Participation rate to the screening of the target patients.
primary_outcome.time_frame: 03 months after the start of the incentive period

reference.citation: Epstein JB, Silverman S Jr, Epstein JD, Lonky SA, Bride MA. Analysis of oral lesion biopsies identified and evaluated by visual examination, chemiluminescence and toluidine blue. Oral Oncol. 2008 Jun;44(6):538-44. Epub 2007 Nov 8. Erratum in: Oral Oncol. 2008 Jun;44(6):615.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Number of physicians who send back at least one clinical  form compared to the numbers of physician of the Somme.
secondary_outcome.measure: The participation rate of the physicians.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 03 months after the start of the incentive period

secondary_outcome.description: The number of tobacco venders who gave at least 01 " Flyer " in comparison to the numbers of tobacco venders of the Somme.
secondary_outcome.measure: The participation rate of the tobacco venders.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 days after the start of the incentive period

collaborator.agency: Regional Observatory of Health and Social Issues in Picardie (OR2S)
Association for the screening of diseases in Somme (Adema 80)

clinical_study.study_design: Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention
